availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sarah Buffum (Salem, Essex County, Massachusetts, resident )

body.p: Salem, Essex County, Massachusetts, resident. Massachusetts native. Daughter of Job Burchstead and Hannah Burchstead. Resident in Salem, Massachusetts in 1850. Married Robert Buffum c.1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Massachusetts, Essex County, Salem, p. 401. Find A Grave, "Sarah E “Elizabeth” Burchstead Buffum (April 10, 1837- December 12, 1878)," Memorial #12808882, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/12808882 (accessed May 6, 2019). KYR-0001-004-0936
